title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Bail Office Bonuses
content:
Lay down the law by rounding up felons and earn 2X GTA$ and RP for bringing Standard Bounty Targets to justice in GTA Online. Secure three Bounty Targets of any kind to complete the Weekly Challenge and also pocket an extra GTA$100,000.

Head to Maze Bank Foreclosures and purchase a Bail Office at 40% off through December 9. All Upgrades and Modifications are also 40% off, so now is a perfect time to add that extra staff member or armor plating for the Bottom Dollar bounty wagon.
